00067 
00068 //== CLASS DEFINITION =========================================================
00069 
00070 
00072 template <class Traits>
00073 struct TriMesh_OSGArrayKernel_GeneratorT
00074 {
00075   typedef FinalMeshItemsT<ArrayItems, Traits, true>  MeshItems;
00076   typedef AttribKernelT<MeshItems>                   AttribKernel;
00077   typedef ArrayKernelT<AttribKernel, MeshItems>      MeshKernel;
00078   typedef TriMeshT<MeshKernel>                       Mesh;
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00082 
00088 template <class Traits = Kernel_OSG::Traits>  
00089 class TriMesh_OSGArrayKernelT 
00090   : public TriMesh_OSGArrayKernel_GeneratorT<Traits>::Mesh 
00091 {};
